name: Flick Audiobooks
description: An audiobook player with chapter navigation, playback speed control, and progress tracking.
long_description:
Flick Audiobooks is a dedicated audiobook player designed for the Flick mobile shell. Features include:

- Library scanning with book folder detection
- Chapter-based navigation
- Playback speed control (0.75x to 2x)
- 30-second skip forward/back
- Progress saving per book and chapter
- Resume functionality
- Lock screen media controls
- Auto-advance through chapters
- Multiple library path support
